trans-unit.source: Stoneforge Mystic
trans-unit.target: Stoneforge Mystic

trans-unit.source: When Stoneforge Mystic enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. {1}{W}, {T}: You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: When Stoneforge Mystic enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. {1}{W}, {T}: You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.source: Mana Drain
trans-unit.target: Mana Drain

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} equal to that spell's mana value.
trans-unit.target: Counter target spell. At the beginning of your next main phase, add an amount of {C} equal to that spell's mana value.

trans-unit.source: "Power is wasted on the weak. They never keep it for long."\n—Nicol Bolas
trans-unit.target: "Power is wasted on the weak. They never keep it for long."\n—Nicol Bolas

trans-unit.resname: J16·3 | Azusa, Lost but Seeking | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Azusa, Lost but Seeking
trans-unit.target: Azusa, Lost but Seeking

trans-unit.resname: J16·3 | Azusa, Lost but Seeking | Card Text
trans-unit.source: You may play two additional lands on each of your turns.
trans-unit.target: You may play two additional lands on each of your turns.

trans-unit.resname: J16·3 | Azusa, Lost but Seeking | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I do not miss Jukai Forest. It is not my home. My home is Kamigawa, its people my family. Wherever I set my pack and rest my head, I am home."
trans-unit.target: "I do not miss Jukai Forest. It is not my home. My home is Kamigawa, its people my family. Wherever I set my pack and rest my head, I am home."

trans-unit.source: Command Beacon
trans-unit.target: Command Beacon

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Command Beacon: Put your commander into your hand from the command zone.
trans-unit.target: {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Sacrifice Command Beacon: Put your commander into your hand from the command zone.

trans-unit.source: "I gazed once into that light. Now it burns in my mind, forever denying me rest."\n—Riku of Two Reflections
trans-unit.target: "I gazed once into that light. Now it burns in my mind, forever denying me rest."\n—Riku of Two Reflections

trans-unit.source: Mystic Confluence
trans-unit.target: Mystic Confluence

trans-unit.source: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. • Return target creature to its owner's hand. • Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. • Return target creature to its owner's hand. • Draw a card.

trans-unit.source: Imperial Seal
trans-unit.target: Imperial Seal

trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. You lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for a card, then shuffle and put that card on top. You lose 2 life.

trans-unit.source: "If Heaven has placed it in your hands, it means that the throne is destined to be yours."
trans-unit.target: "If Heaven has placed it in your hands, it means that the throne is destined to be yours."

trans-unit.resname: J16·7 | Defense of the Heart | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Defense of the Heart
trans-unit.target: Defense of the Heart

trans-unit.resname: J16·7 | Defense of the Heart | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls three or more creatures, sacrifice Defense of the Heart, search your library for up to two creature cards, put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of your upkeep, if an opponent controls three or more creatures, sacrifice Defense of the Heart, search your library for up to two creature cards, put those cards onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: J16·8 | Zur the Enchanter | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Zur the Enchanter
trans-unit.target: Zur the Enchanter

trans-unit.resname: J16·8 | Zur the Enchanter | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying Whenever Zur the Enchanter attacks, you may search your library for an enchantment card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: Flying Whenever Zur the Enchanter attacks, you may search your library for an enchantment card with mana value 3 or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

trans-unit.resname: J16·8 | Zur the Enchanter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Zur remained aloof from Terisiare's suffering, intent only on his own perfection.
trans-unit.target: Zur remained aloof from Terisiare's suffering, intent only on his own perfection.
